Generation IX.Scarlet: These Pokémon gather into groups and form colonies deep within forests. They absolutely hate it when strangers approach.
Generation IX.Violet: It coils its 10 tentacles around prey and sucks out their nutrients, causing the prey pain. The folds along the rim of its head are a popular delicacy.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Socarrat Trail Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Socarrat Trail Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )
